name: Acer Black Aspire XC Series AXC-603G-UW15 Desktop PC with Intel Pentium J2900 Quad-Core Processor, 4GB Memory, 1TB Hard Drive and Windows 8.1

reviews.name: Acer Black Aspire XC Series AXC-603G-UW15 Desktop PC with Intel Pentium J2900 Quad-Core Processor, 4GB Memory, 1TB Hard Drive and Windows 8.1
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice computer for the right price. I cam run my games and software without a problem. I just love the 1 TB Hard Drive. I bought this one because I needed a new computer and I already had the monitor, but on a small budget, this is probably the best PC I have ever used.
reviews.title: A great PC

reviews.name: Acer Black Aspire XC Series AXC-603G-UW15 Desktop PC with Intel Pentium J2900 Quad-Core Processor, 4GB Memory, 1TB Hard Drive and Windows 8.1
reviews.reviewText: This is a somewhat pricey low-end quad core system, with 4GB RAM (single stick, 2 slots), 1TB HDD, integrated graphics, USB 3.0 and HDMI out. You can upgrade the RAM but that's about it and you MUST use DDR3L memory. It appears the CPU is glued to the board and there are no PCI-E slots so you cannot upgrade to a better GPU. It comes with that god-awful Windows 8.1 but you can install Windows 7. Should you wish to go this route be forewarned you MUST downgrade the BIOS first or it won't work - there are instructions online how to do this. All in all it's OK for simple tasks and light gaming but don't expect to do any upgrades except for the RAM.
reviews.title: Alright, for what it is.

reviews.name: Acer Black Aspire XC Series AXC-603G-UW15 Desktop PC with Intel Pentium J2900 Quad-Core Processor, 4GB Memory, 1TB Hard Drive and Windows 8.1
reviews.reviewText:
Computer came with all program and hardware more that I need it' Thanks .
More USB ports will be better
reviews.title: Great value for the money

reviews.name: Acer Black Aspire XC Series AXC-603G-UW15 Desktop PC with Intel Pentium J2900 Quad-Core Processor, 4GB Memory, 1TB Hard Drive and Windows 8.1
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought because it had good specs and a low price. The terabyte memory works incredibly well with how often my family downloads.
reviews.title: Loving it.

reviews.name: Acer Black Aspire XC Series AXC-603G-UW15 Desktop PC with Intel Pentium J2900 Quad-Core Processor, 4GB Memory, 1TB Hard Drive and Windows 8.1
reviews.reviewText: I don't really like the CR-Rom access door - it doesn't stay open and with the CD going in sideways rather than flat seems a little quirky. All-in-all, though, not enough to make me regret buying.
reviews.title: Excellent computer for basic home use.
